name: Monochrome Gaia (Stud)
description:
Experience a life of a villager trying to save their world through light. This short yet thrilling story is calling for you to live it.

It is said that certain shapes make up the pillars of their world and it is your job to find them without angering and being spotted by the invaders. You can hide from them whenever you feel as if you're in danger in special cubes the villagers created centuries ago. Each time you get closer to bringing back the light, the invaders are more frantic and they can scout further... Can you be the hero who brings back the light?

Team Members:

Tenisha Moodley (https://itch.io/profile/tenishamoodley)

Rayyan Gafoor(https://itch.io/profile/memoryghost)
